words.source: H589 (אֲנִי), HC/Pp1cs (conjunctive/personal-pronoun-1cs). KJV 'And I am sure', ESV 'But I', NASB 'But I'. Emphatic pronoun.
H3045 (ידע), HVqp1cs (Qal-perfect-1cs). KJV 'I am sure', ESV 'I know', NASB 'I know'.
H3588 (כִּי), HC (conjunction). KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'. All agree.
H3808 (לֹא), HTn (negative particle). KJV 'not', ESV 'not', NASB 'not'. All agree.
H5414 (נתן), HVqi3ms (Qal-imperfect-3ms). KJV 'will not let', ESV 'will not let', NASB 'will not permit'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo/Sp2mp (direct object marker/suffix-2mp). KJV 'you', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'.
H4428 (מֶלֶךְ), HNcmsc (noun-common-ms-construct). KJV 'the king of', ESV 'the king of', NASB 'the king of'.
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Egypt'.
H1980 (הלך), HR/Vqc (preposition-lamed/Qal-infinitive-construct). KJV 'to go', ESV 'go', NASB 'go'.

H3808 (לֹא), HC/Tn (conjunctive/negative particle). DIVERGENT: KJV 'not by a mighty hand' (i.e. Pharaoh will not yield), ESV 'unless compelled by a mighty hand', NASB 'except under compulsion'. The phrase is understood differently across translations.

H2389 (חָזָק), HAafsa (adjective-fs-absolute). KJV 'a mighty hand', ESV 'a mighty hand', NASB 'a mighty hand'. DIVERGENT: KJV implies Pharaoh will not release them unless forced; ESV/NASB read it as 'unless compelled by a mighty hand' (i.e., God's hand).
